Class ProjectInfo

java.lang.Object
ProjectInfo
public class ProjectInfo extends Object
This class creates an object that contains information about the project, excluding the people involved in the project.

    • getCompleteDate

      public String getCompleteDate()
      Gets the complete date. If complete date is null, then it is set to today's date. The complete date is formatted into a string.
      Returns:
      string of the complete date

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
